channel.description: Recent content in convert on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.Cells | Excel Spreadsheet Processing Java Library
item.description: Java API for Excel File Formats Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Cells for Java is an award-winning Excel Spreadsheet Processing API that allows Java developers to embed the ability to read, write and manipulate Excel® spreadsheets (XLS, XLSX, XLSM, XLSB, XLTX, SpreadsheetML, CSV, ODS), HTML, MHTML, PDF, and image file formats into their own Java applications without needing to rely on Microsoft Excel®.

item.title: Aspose.Slides | Java Library to Process PowerPoint Formats
item.description: Java PowerPoint API Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Slides a Java PowerPoint API for presentation manipulation and management. It allows developers to read, write, convert and manipulate PowerPoint presentations in Java applications with the ability to manipulate all document elements such as slides, tables, text, charts, shapes, images and SmartArt diagrams and more.

item.title: Downloads ---New Releases-aspose.finance-for-python-via-.net-23.1.0,-windows-x64
Exporter for PowerPoint | Aspose.Slides for JasperReports
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.Slides to Export JasperReports® to Presentation Formats Aspose.Slides for JasperReports is a lightweight extension that helps you export reports from JasperReports® and JasperServer® to Microsoft PowerPoint® and other supported file formats. Release Notes Download Product Page | Docs | API Reference | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA Presentation JasperReports® Integration Features Export reports to PPT, PPTX, HTML, and PDF formats.

item.title: Downloads ---New Releases-aspose.finance-for-python-via-.net-23.5.0,-linux-x86,-x64
Aspose.Finance for Python via .NET
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.Finance Python Programming Library for XBRL, iXBRL, OFX Formats Aspose.Finance for Python via .NET is a standalone on-premise API consisting of Python classes that allow you to process and manipuate finance-related formats, such as, XBRL, iXBRL and OFX. Please use the following pip command: Release Notes Download > pip install aspose-finance   Product Page | Docs | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License

On-premise GIS Data Processing API | Aspose.GIS Product Family
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.GIS to Process Geographical Data Open NuGet Package Manager within the Microsoft Visual Studio®, search for Aspose.GIS and install. You may also use the following command within the Package Manager Console. For the detailed instructions please visit the Installation documentation page. Release Notes Download PM> Install-Package Aspose.GIS   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA

item.title: Aspose.Cells 23.8 | Process Spreadsheet Formats via Java API
item.description: Java API for Excel File Formats Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Cells for Java is an award-winning Excel Spreadsheet Processing API that allows Java developers to embed the ability to read, write and manipulate Excel® spreadsheets (XLS, XLSX, XLSM, XLSB, XLTX, SpreadsheetML, CSV, ODS), HTML, MHTML, PDF, and image file formats into their own Java applications without needing to rely on Microsoft Excel®.
